backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to update the final image on the /forever page and listing related files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the app root and preloading background music before loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React Router with all pages and wraps routing inside the MusicProvider.
frontend/src/components/romance/Countdow: Displays a Proposal Day countdown or celebratory message using the useCountdown hook.
frontend/src/components/romance/EasterEg: Interactive heart button that reveals a secret modal message when clicked.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicPro: Manages global background-music state, playback, and autoplay fallback via context.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicTog: Button UI for toggling background music using context state.
frontend/src/components/romance/Overlays: Renders drifting rose‑petal and glowing‑hearts background overlays using static assets.
frontend/src/components/romance/Romantic: Shared layout adding watermark, overlays, music toggle, countdown timer, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Hook calculating remaining time to a target date, updating once per minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, romantic color palette, typography, glow effects, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FeelMyLove.tsx: Interactive romantic page with heart animations and a timed message reveal, leading to the proposal route.
frontend/src/pages/Forever.tsx: Final romantic page featuring heartfelt messages, animations, and imagery symbolizing long-term love.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with animated hearts, romantic intro text, and navigation to the love story route.
frontend/src/pages/LoveLetter.tsx: Displays a styled heartfelt letter with a textured paper background and romantic narrative content.
frontend/src/pages/OurStory.tsx: Implements a scroll‑animated milestone timeline with emotional text cards for the “Our Story” page.
frontend/src/pages/Proposal.tsx: Displays a timed text sequence leading to a proposal question and celebratory animations based on the user’s response.
frontend/src/pages/WhyILoveYou.tsx: Renders an interactive grid of heart‑flip cards showing reasons for love with animated backgrounds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and extended utilities for the site’s romantic theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature descriptions, known issues, and image requirements for the romantic proposal website.
